test.description: api.info.license with missing name property is invalid

errors: Missing required property at api/info/license - expected: name, actual: <none>

test.description: api.info.license with incorrect name property type is invalid

errors: Invalid property type at api/info/license/name - expected: string, actual: object

test.description: api.info.license without url property is valid
api.info.license with incorrect url property type is invalid

errors: Invalid property type at api/info/license/url - expected: string, actual: object

test.description: api.info.license with incorrect url property format is invalid

errors: Invalid format for property value at api/info/license/url - expected: uriref (e.g. https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html), actual: non uri-ref url
